events.title: COMMUNITY EVENTS
events.intro:
Check out Bawky Studio's interactive experimental events!
Where data meets play and your choices become statistics.

avg-number.title: Guess the Average
avg-number.desc:
Two winners will be decided in one event.
1: The player closest to the overall average
2: The player who picked the lowest unique number
Both results are automatically calculated and revealed to everyone.

mystery.title: Mystery
mystery.desc: Stay tuned for the next experimental event!

avg-number.title: Guess the Average
avg-number.description:
The participant whose number is closest to the overall average,
and the one who chose the smallest unique number
will be officially recorded in the Bawky Studio archives.

guidelines.title: üì¢ Before You Participate
rules: Each IP address can participate only once.
Once you click 'Submit', your entry will be finalized immediately.
If your YouTube ID is entered incorrectly, your record may not be saved.

errors.invalidYoutube: Invalid YouTube ID format. It must start with '@'.
errors.outOfRange: Your number must be between 1 and 100000.

success.message: Your entry has been submitted successfully!

intro.text: Bawky Studio is a small team with a big love for making games that hit differently. We believe that humor and personality are what make a game truly shine.

philosophy.title: ‚ö° Philosophy
philosophy.text: We craft games that make players laugh, shout, and question everything. If it‚Äôs weird but fun. that‚Äôs our territory.

focus.title: üéÆ Focus
focus.text: Multiplayer, mind games, and experimental systems that make every session unpredictable. just how we like it.

team.title: MEMBERS
team.Hyuki: My future self is cheering for who i am today

promise.title: OUR PROMISE
promise.text: ‚ÄúWe create games that are as fun to make as they are to play‚Äù

join.title: JOIN OUR TEAM
join.text: We're always on the lookout for developers, artists, and weird minds who love making unconventional games. If you think you‚Äôd fit right in, we‚Äôd love to hear from you.

kalivra.title: Kalivra
kalivra.description:
Kalivra is an open-source game balance analysis and simulation tool.
It lets you experiment with and analyze complex game balance data in a GUI environment,
enabling explainable, data-driven balancing rather than guesswork.
